name: Faith & Encouragement
description: As one striving to be a faithful member of $(l)$(l:https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org)The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints$(/l)$(), I invite those seeking Jesus Christ or struggling with faith to visit my YouTube channel, $(l)$(l:https://www.youtube.com/@miraclesfromtheashes)Miracles From the Ashes$(/l)$(). It offers testimonies, Bible and Book of Mormon messages, and encouragement for the wearyâ€”reminding all of Christ's hope, forgiveness, and love, even when feeling lost.  Discover stories of overcoming doubt, support for regrets, and a path to renewed joy.
